analysis

The MYOCORTEX process begins with an initial complimentary 30-minute consulation to discuss your specific needs and goals. If we determine our system is a good fit for you, we will schedule a complete assessment using Greg Roskopf's Muscle Activiation TechniquesTM (MAT).

Complete MAT assessment

This 60-minute assessment consist of the following:

  • Detailed health history
  • Postural examination
  • Range of motion evaluation

After the assessment is complete, we will have a full understanding of your current physiological state, allowing us to create a plan tailored for your body.
